mapper.sql: id, project_id, project_code, project_name, project_manager, manager_phone, file_url, create_time, creator, Modifier, update_time, delete_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from project_clarificaiton
order by ${orderByClause}

select * from project_clarificaiton where delete_time is null
and project_code like concat('%',#{projectCode},'%')
and project_name like concat('%',#{projectName},'%')
and project_manager like concat('%',#{projectManager},'%')
order by create_time DESC LIMIT #{pageNo},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from project_clarificaiton where delete_time is null
and project_code like concat('%',#{projectCode},'%')
and project_name like concat('%',#{projectName},'%')
and project_manager like concat('%',#{projectManager},'%')
mapper.update:
update project_clarificaiton set delete_time = SYSDATE() where id in
